title: Easy lamb bhuna curry
ingredients: ['4 cloves garlic, peeled', '2.5cm piece root ginger, peeled and chopped', '2 onions, sliced', '140g bhuna curry paste', '500g diced lamb', 'oil as needed', '450ml water', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '4 large mushrooms, sliced', '250g new potatoes', '2 tomatoes, quartered', '100g spinach, fresh or frozen']
